name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Income support of ₹6000 per year in three equal installments to all land holding farmer families.

name: PM-KISAN Credit Card
description: Provides farmers with affordable credit for their agricultural needs and other expenses.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: Housing for all by 2022 - provides financial assistance for construction of pucca houses for eligible households.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
description: Provides loans up to ₹10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises.

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Small savings scheme for girl child education and marriage needs with tax benefits.

name: PM Shram Yogi Maandhan
description: Pension scheme for unorganized workers with monthly income up to ₹15,000.

name: National Scholarship Portal
description: Single-window platform for scholarships to students from minority communities, SC, ST, OBC, etc.

name: Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana
description: Pension scheme for senior citizens providing assured pension based on investment.

name: Stand Up India
description: Facilitates bank loans between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 crore to SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.

name: PM Ujjwala Yojana
description: Provides LPG connections to women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households.

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Pension scheme focused on unorganized sector workers providing guaranteed pension after 60 years of age.

name: PM Kaushal Vikas Yojana
description: Skill development initiative scheme for youth to get industry-relevant skill training.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
description: Provides loans up to ₹10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises through MUDRA loans: Shishu, Kishore, and Tarun.

name: Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for Micro and Small Enterprises (CGTMSE)
description: Provides credit guarantee to financial institutions to enable them to provide collateral-free loans to MSMEs.

name: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
description: Credit-linked subsidy program for setting up new micro-enterprises and generating employment in rural and urban areas.

name: Credit Linked Capital Subsidy Scheme (CLCSS)
description: Facilitates technology upgradation for MSMEs by providing 15% capital subsidy on institutional finance up to ₹1 crore.

name: Startup India Seed Fund Scheme
description: Provides financial assistance to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, market entry, and commercialization.

name: ZED (Zero Defect Zero Effect) Certification Scheme
description: Promotes quality and green manufacturing among MSMEs with financial support for ZED certification and consultancy.

name: A Scheme for Promotion of Innovation, Rural Industries and Entrepreneurship (ASPIRE)
description: Creates a network of technology and incubation centers to accelerate entrepreneurship and promote startups for innovation in agro and rural industry.

name: Trade Related Entrepreneurship Assistance and Development (TREAD) Scheme for Women
description: Provides financial loans through NGOs and training & counseling for women entrepreneurs in non-farm activities.
